title: Crime Alert 01.04.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.04.19
description:
Will an Amazon Echo solve a murder? The family of Marvin Gaye to get millions over song rights. Mother of missing Maddie McCann urges other parents to speak out.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
